about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Turning Everyday Cars Into
about.description: GeoWrap is an automotive customization and protection studio based in Tbilisi, Georgia, specializing in high-end vehicle wrapping and detailing services. With expert craftsmanship, premium materials, and a strong attention to detail, we deliver tailored solutions designed to enhance, protect, and elevate luxury and performance vehicles, ensuring flawless results and lasting value.

items.name: Paint Protection Film
items.description: What is the purpose of self-healing protective film?
items.paragraph: Self-healing Paint Protection Film (PPF) protects your vehicle's surface from scratches, paint damage from stone chips, and fading. The vehicle maintains its original brilliance long-term. Currently, no better protection exists in the world.

items.name: Color Wrap
items.description: What is the purpose of color-changing film?
items.paragraph: Using color film allows you to change your vehicle's style and visual appearance at any time. Compared to painting, color wrapping has many benefits: no polishing is required after application, there are no mismatched color tones, the service is performed in cleaner conditions compared to paint shop procedures, and if any element is damaged, that specific part can be replaced with new film in just a few hours.

items.name: Interior Care
items.description: Why is interior cleaning so important?
items.paragraph: Many of us think that over the years, a car's interior only needs wet wipes and vacuuming; however, every vehicle requires professional and detailed cleaning at least every 6 months (season to season). Upon completion of the cleaning, it is essential to use a leather conditioner to protect it from fading and cracking.

items.name: Ceramic Coating
items.description: What is the real purpose of ceramic coating?
items.paragraph: If you do not wish to apply protective film to your vehicle, ceramic coating is the minimum protection and alternative. Ceramics serve 3 main purposes: it protects the vehicle's surface from minor micro-scratches, highlights and deepens the vehicle's color, adds a supernatural shine, and protects the car's clear coat from premature fading.

items.name: Rim Powder Coating & Restoration
items.description: Why is this technology better than standard painting?
items.paragraph: Powder coating (also known as thermal painting) is a painting technology where your vehicle's rims are not damaged during high-pressure washing, as this technology is very hard and withstands heavy loads. Rims are painted at 180°C to 200°C, and their minimum service life is 5 years.

items.name: Window Tinting
items.description: Cool interior, increased privacy, and UV protection.
items.paragraph: Our window tinting service combines aesthetics with functionality, blocking harmful UV rays and reducing light transmission. Professionally installed film ensures improved comfort and long-lasting protection for both you and your vehicle's interior.

items.name: Noise and Vibration Insulation
items.description: Travel peacefully with noise and vibration minimization control.
items.paragraph: Experience a quieter ride thanks to our noise and vibration isolation. Using high-quality materials, we reduce interior noise, engine vibrations, and road hum.

items.name: Polishing
items.description: Restore your vehicle's shine and get rid of unpleasant scratches.
items.paragraph: After professional polishing services, your vehicle is freed from holographic surface marks that appear in the sun. The car's original brilliance is restored, and it is cleared of unpleasant deep scratches.

items.name: Detailing Wash
items.description: More than just a wash - a full refresh for your vehicle.
items.paragraph: This deep cleaning process goes beyond a standard wash, covering every detail of your car's exterior. From a gentle hand wash to precision drying and tire care, our detailing wash restores your car's brilliance and showroom look.

items.name: Paintless Dent Repair
items.description: Removing dents without damaging the lacquer.
items.paragraph: Our Paintless Dent Repair (PDR) technique removes dents and dings while maintaining your vehicle's original finish. This is a fast, affordable, and eco-friendly solution that restores your car's appearance without the need for repainting.

workshop.title: Workshop
workshop.subtitle: Check out our most impressive works

items.name: Petre Isakadze
items.text: This guys delivered a flawless vehicle wrap experience! Their team combined premium materials, meticulous installation, and excellent design expertise to bring my G 63 to life. Also Transparent communication, on-time completion, and a customer-first approach made the process stress-free. My ride now looks stunning and turns heads everywhere exactly what I hoped for! Highly recommend for anyone seeking quality, professionalism, and artistry!

items.name: Mari Arutiniani
items.text: The service is top-notch! This is a company where I don't worry about leaving my car. The staff is always friendly, and everything is top-notch. The atmosphere, the location, and, most importantly, the professional wrappers who make my car look like a doll :) Thank you for everything!

items.name: George Machitidze
items.text: My car has never looked more sleek! Communicative staff, complete trust and transparency, exceptional product. Highly recommended.

items.name: Levan Devsurashvili
items.text: Very good service, which is unfortunately rare in Georgia. The quality is definitely worth the price. The environment is also very friendly and good. Good luck to the GeoWrap team.
